Rosemary Rowena Cooper (a mụrụ n'afọ 1935) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Britain.

Ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 1956, sonye na Radio Drama Company site na mmeri Carlton Hobbs Bursary. N'afọ 1959, ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ Dundee Repertory Theatre Company ma gaa n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị ukwuu, ọkachasị na telivishọn Britain, ruo ihe karịrị afọ 50. Cooper pụtara na The Rag Trade dịka Mrs Fenner
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Terrence Hardiman n'afọ 1964.
